roomTypes.name: Deluxe Room
roomTypes.description: Overlooking the airport and equipped with tea or coffee maker. The air-conditioned rooms come with a 2-seater sofa, TV, and private bathrooms including shower and free toiletries. Features include comfortable accommodation with amenities such as cable television, telephone, and modern fittings in attached washrooms with hot and cold water. 24-hour room service is available.

roomTypes.name: Super Deluxe Room
roomTypes.description: Super Deluxe Room provides a serene atmosphere and comfort at a nominal price. Features include air conditioning, cable television, telephone, modern attached washrooms with hot and cold water, and 24-hour room service.

roomTypes.name: Family Room
roomTypes.description: Family Room provides a serene atmosphere and comfort for the entire family in one room. The hotel offers comfortable accommodation with air conditioning, cable television, telephone, modern washrooms, and 24-hour room service.

amenities.name: Free Wi-Fi

amenities.name: Room Service
amenities.description: 24-hour room service for dining in the comfort of your room.
